Sequence. Fast.

Meenta believes that scientists need to be freed up to focus on discoveries, not searching, finding or booking equipment.

Our online platform enables you to find, book and send samples to host instruments.

Through Meenta, finding scientific equipment is as easy as spinning up servers on Amazon Cloud: just book an instrument when you need it and pay as you go.

Our initial application makes Next-generation sequencing instruments accessible through our online booking platform.

  • No more requesting quotes or sending e-mails to multiple NGS service providers for pricing and availability.
  • Just type your read length, read type, run mode.
  • Select your instrument and we drop ship the sample to the service lab for you.

Start Sequencing Now

Need help with your experiement design?

We are happy to help. Start a chat, email or give us a call. Of course, we also have FAQs that are always available.
